column119: During Periods of engineering work, rail replacement buses will pick up and set down as detailed below. Look for buses displaying a yellow banner with the wording Rail Replacement Service. Customers travelling to Hornsey and Harringay should use local bus routes W3 and 29. Southbound buses will stop on the far side of Seven Sisters Road under the railway bridge. Northbound buses will stop on the near side of Seven Sisters Road Buses to Hornsey will stop directly outside the station exit. The departure point for buses to Alexandra Palace and to the North may vary from day-to-day. At times when buses are operating, bus co-ordinators will be able to show you to your service. These bus co-ordinators will be wearing high visibility yellow jackets. (When trains are not working between Finsbury Park and Kings Cross customers may wish to use London Underground Piccadilly or Victoria Line services to London Kings Cross St.Pancras). For details of engineering work please visit www.firstcapitalconnect.co.uk/changes Heavy luggage, prams, bicycles etc. may not be conveyed on bus services.
